00015               << "Your input was (" << mat.M << "x" << mat.N << ") * ("
00016               << vec.L << ")." << std::endl;
00017     exit(1);
00018   }
00019 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00020   
00021   dcovector newvec(mat.M);
00022   dgemv_( 'N', mat.M, mat.N, 1.0, mat.Array, mat.M,
00023           vec.Array, 1, 0.0, newvec.array, 1 );
00024   
00025   mat.destroy();
00026   return _(newvec);
00027 }
